title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 80.61 - Personal use
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 80.61 - Personal use

State Regulations
A person authorized by law to obtain controlled substances for professional use shall not use such drugs for the treatment of his own addiction, or habitual use. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
80.61

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
